Package com.islandpower.configurator.controller.project

Class ProjectLocationController

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.controller.project.ProjectLocationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/projects/{projectId}/location") public class ProjectLocationController extends Object
Controller for managing location-related data for a project.

Provides endpoints for processing location data, updating the project's site information, and retrieving site details for a specific project.

  • Method Details

    • processLocationData

      @PostMapping("/process") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Site> processLocationData(@PathVariable String projectId, @RequestParam double latitude, @RequestParam double longitude, @RequestParam int angle, @RequestParam int aspect, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="false") boolean useOptimalValues, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Processes location data and updates the project's site information.
      Parameters:
      projectId - - the ID of the project
      latitude - - the latitude of the location
      longitude - - the longitude of the location
      angle - - the panel angle
      aspect - - the panel aspect
      useOptimalValues - - whether to use optimal angle and aspect values
      request - - the HTTP request containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity - the updated site data or an error response

    • getSites

      @GetMapping("/sites") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Site> getSites(@PathVariable String projectId, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieves site data for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - - the ID of the project
      request - - the HTTP request containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity - the site data or an error response
